articles.author: Rachel Treisman
articles.title: Trump's tariffs are so far-reaching they include several remote, uninhabited islands - NPR
articles.description: The global tariffs Trump announced this week include remote territories like Heard and McDonald Islands in the Indian Ocean that don't actually have human populations. Here's what to know about them.
articles.content:
The Trump administration's long list of nations targeted by forthcoming U.S. tariffs includes several territories so remote that they don't have any permanent human residents.
